title: pArthasArathi un
sahitya:
pArthasArathi un pAdam paNIndEn kaDaikkaN pArttaruL tiruvallikkENi urai


anupallavi

  Arkkum kaDal shUzha ambuvitanil munnam pArthanukku gItai parind-upadEshitta


caraNam    neDiya tiruvuruvam nenjam tanil koNDunnai aDutta mangaikkarUL shurandu avaL kuzhal
 muDittIDap pOr toDuttu sArathiyAi pArthanukkAgap-pari naDattip-pagaivar
 toDutta bANam tAngi nonda un mEniyin puNNATra paN pADik-koNDADi
